name: Granny Mods: granny games
description:
This is a Granny Mods game, you can find all of the scary granny mods available. In this scary game, you get the option to mod your way around and escape a scary granny's house in the dark. Spawn and collect many different items everywhere. Multiple maps to choose from in the game play.
This mod also offers granny games a single player mode and a multiplayer mode. You now have the option to become granny online with friends or mod a granny into game play.
